data.title: Hangman
data.solution:
hangman = ['    0  0  0  0  0  0 ',
           '       | /| /|\\/|\\/|\\',
           '                / / \\']

word = input()
n = int(input())

bad_guesses = sum(input()not in word for i in range(n))

for line in hangman:
    print(line[bad_guesses*3:(bad_guesses+1)*3])
print(['Won', 'Lost'][bad_guesses == 6])

"""
# Sample Short Solution
i=input
w=set(i())
b=sum(i()not in w for l in range(int(i())))
for l in['   '+' 0 '*6,' '*7+'| /| '+'/|\\'*3,' '*16+'/ / \\']:print(l[b*3:(b+1)*3])
i(['Won','Lost'][b>=6])
"""
data.statement: Given a word and a list of guesses, print out the hangman and <<Won>> if it was solved in time or <<Lost>> if the game was lost.

data.constraints:
6 incorrect guesses is a loss (full hangman)
Completing the word before 6 incorrect guesses is a win
0 < length([[word]]) <= 35
[[word]] is all lowercase alphabet characters (no spaces or symbols)
0 < [[n]] <= 50
All [[guess]]es are valid lowercase alphabet characters  without repetition
All games end after winning or losing
All games are either won or lost
data.stubGenerator:
read word:word(40)
read n:int
loop n read guess:word(1)
write Won
data.inputDescription:
<<First Line:>> [[word]] for the puzzle
<<Second Line:>> Number of guesses taken [[n]]
<<Next [[n]] Lines:>> Single valid character [[guess]]
data.outputDescription:
<<3 Lines:>> A 3x3 partial or full hangman (including spaces)
Possible Outputs in order (<<HINT:>> Just copy-paste if needed):
`    0  0  0  0  0  0 
       | /| /|\/|\/|\
               /  / \`
<<4th Line:>> <<Won>> or <<Lost>> depending on game result

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a word and a list of guesses, print out the hangman and Won if it was solved in time or Lost if the game was lost.
Input
First Line: word for the puzzle
Second Line: Number of guesses taken n
Next n Lines: Single valid character guess
Output
3 Lines: A 3x3 partial or full hangman (including spaces)
Possible Outputs in order (HINT: Just copy-paste if needed):
    0  0  0  0  0  0 
       | /| /|\/|\/|\
               /  / \

4th Line: Won or Lost depending on game result
Constraints
6 incorrect guesses is a loss (full hangman)
Completing the word before 6 incorrect guesses is a win
0 < length(word) <= 35
word is all lowercase alphabet characters (no spaces or symbols)
0 < n <= 50
All guesses are valid lowercase alphabet characters without repetition
All games end after winning or losing
All games are either won or lost
Example
Input
hangman
8
t
n
g
m
z
s
h
a
Output
 0 
/| 
   
Won
